welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Short Pump, the charming city known for its blend of small town charm and modern amenities. We invite you to explore our vibrant community and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Richmond International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights and is located within the main terminal building.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for international flights and is located within the main terminal building.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the 'RIC Free WiFi' network.
